original_title: The Tale of Timmy Two Chins
overview: Timmy wants nothing more than to catch the eye of his high school crush. Teased at school for being 'Timmy Two Chins,' his weight makes him feel unmanly and invisible. A big mistake forces him to take a hard look at himself. Being manly and powerful is not about muscles, Timmy realizes, it begins with appreciating himself and the people around him.
title: The Tale of Timmy Two Chins
